page.title: 08View From School Window 2
page.content: by as if in a race. Another car pulls out to join in the race, signals left and is gone out of sight for another day. Sudden noises fill the air as the children escape out of school and become a circus, screaming and shouting, the circus acts begin. Clowns fooling around, monkeys chattering and swinging on the railings and horses parading about. At the other side of the playground acrobats go through their paces and performing dogs yap, pose and play for their audience. Suddenly all attention is drawn to the far edge of the circus ring. Monkeys on one side, horses on another - a battle begins..... ...the school bell rings and all is quiet once more, except for the droning whistle of the wind.........
